overview: Harry Musk is one in a million. That means that he's the one out of a million children who is perfectly proportioned but will never grow larger than a typical six-year-old. Adult, pint-sized Harry longs to be part of the big world.
tagline: Something's Got To Give......! When the emotions and longings of a man are pent-up in the body of a child!
title: It's a Small World
